Functions
forwardImplements perfect forwarding, such as in a function template, when v is a function argument which needs to be passed as an argument to another function as-is: if v is an rvalue, an rvalue is forwarded, if it’s an lvalue, an lvalue is forwarded.
forwardSee above.
moveConverts a given value into rvalue reference.

Functions

forward

template<typename T> inline T&& forward(typename RR<T>::t &v)

Implements perfect forwarding, such as in a function template, when v is a function argument which needs to be passed as an argument to another function as-is: if v is an rvalue, an rvalue is forwarded, if it’s an lvalue, an lvalue is forwarded.

forward

See above.

Implements perfect forwarding, such as in a function template, when v is a function argument which needs to be passed as an argument to another function as-is: if v is an rvalue, an rvalue is forwarded, if it’s an lvalue, an lvalue is forwarded.
